data.message: Stop trying to remake the classics. Your just destroying everyone of them. This is just another bad choice and hope it fails like Ben Hur.

replies.message: Well i have to agree with that! Seven Samurai was a total classic! & The Magnificent  Seven was a classic western adaption from it! I do love Eminem music & a lot of actors here, but I'm a bit of a realist! I'm sure this suppose to b cool,  but in reality Denzel cldnt lead a team like this then! Even Sliverardo had a more realist view of black man then! Now we may not like it! With all race issues that flood our tv's & daily life these days! But that's how it was bk then.  Like when they did wild wild west remake! Seriously?  Bk then there were free slaves,  but not like this! I just get ticked when a remake is so far from original! & so off historical reality.  Pretending  there wasn't ever slavery doesn't make it so!!!! Just saying!!! I'm sure I'm going to b labelled a racist 4 this comment. I'm far from it! I just can't stand western movies that so go so far into fantasy!!!!
I guess you don't know your history about the west!
The Lone Ranger was was based on a black man... Bass Reeves the first United States black US Marshal, that did his job for over 35yrs.
But Amerikkka won't tell that story.
Chuck Behler And when they do make a remake very similar to the original people get mad that they didn't do anything to change it or spice it up. No win scenario huh?
Magnificent 7 has nothing to do with the lone ranger. If you can't come up with new ideas then you shouldn't be in the business. I performed for several years and made up my own routines.
I'm going off a comment about blacks in the old West, that chuck was talking about... So read and try to keep up with the rest of the class Duane Rayne.

Hey I started this comment and you changed it to a black thing so why don't you reread and get educated and see this has nothing to do with that. But once again I see you want to change it into something it's not so why not just stay off my page.
But chuck actually changed the subject lol
Thank you Marcus Levee lol, Duane Rayne is just butt hurt and a dumb ass.
No neither of you idiots can read . You both are illiterate.
Hoping something fails for someone else, now that's classy. What are you 12 Duane Rayne?
